channel.title: What can i do to improve my work?
channel.description:
hi guys,
I really enjoy editing images and stuff, but creating something i completly suck. here is bassicly the best i can do atm really -
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/4411/vectorsigru0.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img253.imageshack.us/img253/9297/sight3.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/7836/tvly5.gif[/img][/URL] Shot at 2007-08-13
o and [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img119.imageshack.us/img119/9295/tshirtnw5.png[/img][/URL](lol)
can anyone post some constructive stuff to help me improve? id really appreciate it.
thx guys,
solemn wishes.

item.title: What can i do to improve my work?
item.dc:creator: @maru maru
item.description:
@maru wrote:

Photoshop is better, and easier to use, than Fireworks.

Read full topic
item.source: What can i do to improve my work?

item.title: What can i do to improve my work?
item.dc:creator: @MybBob MybBob
item.description:
@MybBob wrote:

I must say that your abstract style isn’t that bad, its just sometimes your signatures can lack the depth and flow which in turn degrades the signature, making it less complicated to the stage they are too simple;

1.) Work on flow and lighting, this can give your signatures depth and looks beyond compare.
2.) Work on the transition from the background to the render, giving a nice flow through the signature.

Once those 2 points are down, your signatures can slowly become better and better with time and practice

Read full topic
item.source: What can i do to improve my work?

well, you could go to numerous websites with tutorials.

Try all the tools, effects etc.
Good luck, and by the way, photoshop is a million times better than fireworks.

item.title: What can i do to improve my work?
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:5, topic:133357”]1) Who is this:

  1. Your signatures lack depth, and flow. It seems your trying to do vector/abstract style, whic is awesome ;\
    What you need right now is to experiment with different filters and tools to get use to them, and see what they can do. Reading basic tutorials would help get the hang of some of the tools, so you know what you can do with them.
    Good Luck :)[/quote]

thx mate that really helps, all the stuff i made so far has been in fireworks tho. so maybe i should get photoshop lol?

Read full topic

item.title: What can i do to improve my work?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

  1. Who is this:

  2. Your signatures lack depth, and flow. It seems your trying to do vector/abstract style, whic is awesome ;\
    What you need right now is to experiment with different filters and tools to get use to them, and see what they can do. Reading basic tutorials would help get the hang of some of the tools, so you know what you can do with them.
    Good Luck

item.title: What can i do to improve my work?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Basically, your sigs seem to consist of a layer on top of or below a render. To make them extra-1337 sawce, you need filters. Blur it, rape it, sharpen it, and finger it. Try to get a background with a similar color scheme as the render, and blend them together.

Anyway, this is why we need more tutorials that follow this instead of specific tutorials that achieve specific effects.

Read full topic
